        waitAny
      • waitAny(condition: untyped; timeout: untyped = 0): untyped

This module contains support to manipulate windows and standard windows controls. There are two ways to find a specified window. windows() iterator, or enumerate() template. The main difference is that inside the iterator, it must create a seq of all windows and then yield one by one. However, the enumerate() template can be break during enumeration if specified window is found. Moreover, the enumerate() template can aslo collect the window that match the specified condition.

Procs

proc `$`(x: Window): string {.borrow, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
The stringify operator for a window. 
proc `==`(x, y: Window): bool {.borrow, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Checks for equality between two window. 
proc activate(window: Window) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Activates (gives focus to) a window. 
proc click(window: Window; button = mbLeft; pos = wDefaultPoint; clicks = 1) {.
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Sends a mouse click command to a given window. The default position is center. 
proc click(window: Window; item: MenuItem) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Invokes a menu item of a window. 
proc close(window: Window) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Closes a window. 
proc disable(window: Window) {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Disables the window. 
proc enable(window: Window) {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Enables the window. 
proc flash(window: Window; flashes = 4; delay = 500; wait = true) {....raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Flashes a window in the taskbar. 
proc focus(window: Window) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Focus a window. 
proc getActiveWindow(): Window {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Get the currently active window. 
proc getCaretPos(window: Window): wPoint {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the coordinates of the caret in the given window (works for foreground window only). 
proc getChildren(window: Window): seq[Window] {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Retrieves the children of a given window. 
proc getClassName(window: Window): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc getClientPosition(window: Window; pos: wPoint = (0, 0)): wPoint {.
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Retrieves the screen coordinates of specified client-area coordinates. 
proc getClientPosition(window: Window; x: int; y: int): wPoint {....raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Retrieves the screen coordinates of specified client-area coordinates.

Example:

import mouse

proc example() =
  move(activeWindow().clientPosition(100, 100))
proc getClientSize(window: Window): wSize {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Retrieves the size of a given window's client area. 
proc getHandle(window: Window): HWND {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Gets the Win32 hWnd from the specified window. 
proc getParent(window: Window): Window {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Retrieves the parent of a given window. 
proc getPosition(window: Window; pos: wPoint = (0, 0)): wPoint {....raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Retrieves the screen coordinates of specified window position. 
proc getPosition(window: Window; x: int; y: int): wPoint {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Retrieves the screen coordinates of specified window position.

Example:

import mouse

proc example() =
  move(activeWindow().position(100, 100))
proc getProcess(window: Window): Process {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Retrieves the process associated with a window. 
proc getRect(window: Window): wRect {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Retrieves the position and size of a given window. 
proc getSize(window: Window): wSize {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Retrieves the size of a given window. 
proc getStatusBarText(window: Window; index = 0): string {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Retrieves the text from a standard status bar control. 
proc getText(window: Window; detectHidden = false): string {....raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Retrieves the text from a window. 
proc getTitle(window: Window): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc getTransparent(window: Window): int {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Gets the transparency of a window. Return -1 if failed. 
proc hide(window: Window) {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Hides window. 
proc isActive(window: Window): bool {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Checks to see if a specified window is currently active. 
proc isEnabled(window: Window): bool {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Checks to see if a specified window is currently enabled. 
proc isExists(window: Window): bool {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Checks to see if a specified window exists. 
proc isFocused(window: Window): bool {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Checks to see if a specified window has the focus. 
proc isMaximized(window: Window): bool {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Checks to see if a specified window is currently maximized. 
proc isMinimized(window: Window): bool {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Checks to see if a specified window is currently minimized. 
proc isVisible(window: Window): bool {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Checks to see if a specified window is currently visible. 
proc kill(window: Window; byProcess = true) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Forces a window to close by terminating the related process or thread. 
proc maximize(window: Window) {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Maximize the window. 
proc minimize(window: Window) {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Minimize the window. 
proc minimizeAll() {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Minimizes all windows. Equal to send("#m"). 
proc minimizeAllUndo() {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Undoes a previous minimizeAll(). Equal to send("#+m"). 
proc repr(x: Window): string {....raises: [Exception], tags: [RootEffect],
                               forbids: [].}
Returns string representation of a window. 
proc restore(window: Window) {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Undoes a window minimization or maximization 
proc setOnTop(window: Window; flag = true) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Change a window's "Always On Top" attribute. 
proc setPosition(window: Window; pos: wPoint) {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Moves a window. 
proc setPosition(window: Window; x: int; y: int) {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Moves a window. 
proc setRect(window: Window; rect: wRect) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Moves and resizes a window. 
proc setRect(window: Window; x: int; y: int; width: int; height: int) {.inline,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Moves and resizes a window. 
proc setSize(window: Window; size: wSize) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Resizes a window. 
proc setSize(window: Window; width: int; height: int) {.inline, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Resizes a window. 
proc setTitle(window: Window; title: string) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Changes the title of a window. 
proc setTransparent(window: Window; alpha: range[0 .. 255]) {....raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Sets the transparency of a window. A value of 0 sets the window to be fully transparent. 
proc show(window: Window) {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Shows window.

Iterators

iterator allWindows(): Window {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Iterates over all top-level windows and their descendants. 
iterator allWindows(parent: Window): Window {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Iterates over all the descendants that belong to the specified window. 
iterator menuItems(window: Window): MenuItem {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Iterates over all the menu items in the specified window.

Example:

import strutils

proc example() =
  for window in windows():
    if window.className == "Notepad":
      for item in window.menuItems:
        if "Ctrl+O" in item.text:
          window.click(item)
      break
iterator windows(): Window {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Iterates over all the top-level windows. 
iterator windows(parent: Window): Window {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Iterates over the children that belong to the specified parent window.

Templates

template enumerate(body: untyped): untyped
Enumerates all the top-level windows. A window symbol is injected into the body. The template can return a seqWindow that collects all window if the body can be evaluated as true. Use enumerateBreak template to break the enumeration.

Example:

proc example() =
  echo enumerate(window.title != "")

Example:

proc example() =
  enumerate:
    if window.className == "Notepad":
      echo window.title
      enumerateBreak
template enumerate(parent: untyped; body: untyped): untyped
Enumerates the children that belong to the specified parent window. A window symbol is injected into the body. The template can return a seqWindow that collects all window if the body can be evaluated as true. Use enumerateBreak template to break the enumeration.

Example:

proc example() =
  enumerate:
    if window.className == "Notepad":
      enumerate(window):
        echo window.className

      enumerateBreak
template enumerateAll(body: untyped): untyped
Enumerates all top-level windows and their descendants. A window symbol is injected into the body. The template can return a seqWindow that collects all window if the body can be evaluated as true. Use enumerateBreak template to break the enumeration.

Example:

proc example() =
  enumerateAll:
    if window.className == "Button" and window.title != "":
      echo window.repr
template enumerateAll(parent: untyped; body: untyped): untyped
Enumerates all the descendants that belong to the specified window. A window symbol is injected into the body. The template can return a seqWindow that collects all window if the body can be evaluated as true. Use enumerateBreak template to break the enumeration.

Example:

proc example() =
  enumerate:
    if window.className == "Notepad":
      enumerateAll(window):
        echo window.className

      enumerateBreak
template waitAll(condition: untyped; timeout: untyped = 0): untyped
Repeatly examines all the top-level windows until condition becomes true for all windows. A window symbol is injected into the condition. timeout specifies how long to wait (in seconds). Default (0) is to wait indefinitely.

Example:

proc example() =
  waitAll(window.className != "Notepad")
template waitAny(condition: untyped; timeout: untyped = 0): untyped
Repeatly examines all the top-level windows until condition becomes true for any window. A window symbol is injected into the condition. timeout specifies how long to wait (in seconds). Default (0) is to wait indefinitely. The template can return the window that match the condition.

Example:

proc example() =
  waitAny(window.className == "Notepad" and window.isActive)

Made with Nim.
